front.title: HTTP Connection Reuse Based on TLS Encrypted ClientHello

abstract.t: This document specifies new criteria under which HTTP/2 clients may reuse connections. It updates [RFC7540]. Discussion Venues This note is to be removed before publishing as an RFC. Source for this draft and an issue tracker can be found at https://github.com/chris-wood/draft-wood-httpbis-ech-coalescing.
